# a√±adir leyendas

legend(posicion, 
      col=c("...","...",...), 
      lwd = $numero , 
      legend = c("...","...",...))

posicion se puede poner, 
"bottom","bottomright","bottomleft"
"top",...
"center",...

```{r}
x = seq(0,2*pi,0.1)

plot(x,sin(x),type = "l", col="blue")
lines(x,cos(x),col="green")
lines(x,tan(x),col="purple")
legend("bottomleft",
       col = c("blue","green","purple"), 
       lwd = 2,
       legend=c("seno","coseno","tangente"))

```
